name: Ladder Drills
description: Enhancing footwork, agility, and coordination using agility ladder exercises.

cards.title: Quick Feet Ladder Drill
cards.description: Increasing foot speed and coordination with rapid step sequences.
bulletpoints: Step lightly and quickly through the ladder squares
Focus on smooth transitions between steps
Keep upper body stable and minimize head movement

cards.title: Lateral Agility Ladder Drill
cards.description: Improving lateral movement speed and balance.
bulletpoints: Step side-to-side through the ladder as quickly as possible
Keep knees slightly bent for better stability
Engage core muscles to maintain control and speed
